thread.title: Here's Joe Biden Hanging Out In A Ford GT And A Dodge Challenger
thread.title_full: Here's Joe Biden Hanging Out In A Ford GT And A Dodge Challenger

author: Patrick George
title: Here's Joe Biden Hanging Out In A Ford GT And A Dodge Challenger
text:
Go to permalink Photos credit Kurt Bradley 
Joe Biden only has about a week left as Vice President of the United States. So what’s a hardcore car guy like him supposed to do before he leaves office? Go to the Detroit Auto Show and sit in all the really fast stuff, naturally. Vice President Joe Biden Gets Permission To Drive A Corvette, Immediately Does A Burnout Vice President Joe Biden Gets Permission To Drive A Corvette, Immediately Does A Burnout Vice President Joe Biden Gets Permission To Drive… The Secret Service let Vice President of these United States Joe Biden drive his 1967 Corvette when … Read more Read more 
As one of his last official trips in office, Biden came to Detroit today to honor winners of the Motor City Match entrepreneurship grant program. He also touted the city’s continuing economic recovery, according to The Detroit Free Press . Advertisement Advertisement 
That’s the official cover, anyway. We all know why he was really here, the same reason any of you go to an auto show too: to see stuff like the Dodge Challenger T/A and the new Ford GT. We know Biden’s a Corvette guy , but he’s clearly open minded. 
I think Jalopnik needs to get this guy in some fast American metal when he’s, uh, less busy soon. Recommended Stories
